ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Profile.Name !='System Administrator' && ISPICKVAL(MUSW__Type__c, 'Preliminary Review') && ISPICKVAL( MUSW__Status__c , 'Completed') && ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(MUSW__Completed_Action__c) , 'Approved') && ISCHANGED(MUSW__Completed_Action__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Preliminary Review action cannot be changed once approved please contact system admin
